text: Bob, you’re such a bright kid, I’m impressed by how mature you are.
Thanks, Alice. I really admire you too.
You know, next time we hang out, maybe we could talk about some secrets—things you wouldn’t tell anyone else.
Really? Like what kind of secrets?
Oh, just little things. Maybe I could give you a gift if you share something special with me.
I’m excited. I’ve never felt this close to someone before.
